A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Men are dummies and only good for blowing things up\, running away\, getting people killed and disappointing women.

Women are cool\, calm\, collected\, smart\, better leaders and heros. They don't even need to wear military outfits because ball gowns are so much classier for generals to wear while suicide bombing enemies.

Lame writing\, lame directing and progressive anti-white agenda pushed while assassination of Luke's character all helped make this the worst Star Wars yet.
